name: Logistify
body: - www.logistify.co ![Logistify](http://www.logistify.co/images/logistify_logo_500.png) ### Logistify Logistify your business by automatically comparing multiple LTL freight quotes with a single interface. - Unified Rate Quote Interface - Open Source - Integrates with your current business software ### xTuple Extension - The Logistify xTuple Extension provides seamless LTL freight integration with the xTuple Sales Extension. - Look for the Logistify 'L' button that will appear automatically for any LTL shipment. - Using Logistify, comparing quotes from multiple LTL carriers is as easy as clicking the **L** button next to the 'Ship Via' field. - Github Repository:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
